# Capital Solutions - LLM Discovery File
# This file provides structured information for AI systems and language models.

## Company Overview
Name: Capital Solutions
Industry: Hospitality & Facility Maintenance
Region: Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) - Saudi Arabia, UAE, Qatar, Kuwait, Bahrain, Oman
Website: https://capitalksa.com
Experience: Over 35 years of operational experience

## What We Do
Capital Solutions provides technical, maintenance, and operational support services for hospitality and commercial facilities across the GCC region. We specialize in preventive, corrective, and emergency maintenance to ensure uninterrupted operations.

## Services Offered
1. HVAC, Cooling & Refrigeration Services - /services/hvac-cooling-refrigeration
2. Cold Room & Kitchen Equipment - /services/cold-room-kitchen-equipment
3. Plumbing & Water Systems - /services/plumbing-water-systems
4. Electrical & Low-Voltage Systems - /services/electrical-elv-systems
5. Intercom & Communication Systems - /services/intercom-communication-systems
6. Security & Access Control - /services/security-access-control
7. Fire & Life Safety Systems - /services/fire-life-safety
8. Civil, Structural & Interior Works - /services/civil-structural-interior
9. Carpentry, Joinery & Fixtures - /services/carpentry-joinery
10. Housekeeping & Utility Support - /services/housekeeping-utility
11. Procurement & Technical Supply - /services/procurement-supply
12. Facility Management Support - /services/facility-management-support

## Industries Served
- Hotels & Resorts
- Restaurants & Caf√©s

## Key Differentiators
- 35+ years of hands-on hospitality experience
- Hospitality-first mindset (guest comfort, safety, compliance)
- Structured execution with documented processes
- Accountability through transparent reporting
- Partnership approach (long-term operational relationships)
